thread.title: The Head of the State visited surgeons at a military hospital in Donetsk region, presented awards
thread.title_full: The Head of the State visited surgeons at a military hospital in Donetsk region, presented awards

title: The Head of the State visited surgeons at a military hospital in Donetsk region, presented awards
text:
During his trip to Donetsk region, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy visited the frontline surgical team of the 59th Military Mobile Hospital of the Military Medical Clinical Center of the Northern Region.
The Head of State familiarized himself with the work of the surgical team, which receives wounded defenders from stabilization points of the Lyman and Soledar tactical forces and provides them with medical assistance.
The President presented the orders "For Courage" III class and Princess Olga III class to the medical staff of the surgical group.
"Thank you for everything you do, for bringing our boys and girls – our warriors – back to life. I wish you good health because your mission requires a lot of strength and good health," Volodymyr Zelenskyy said, addressing the military medics.
The President also spoke with the injured servicemen undergoing treatment there and presented them with state awards.
"Thank you for fighting so bravely. Congratulations on the holidays. I wish you a speedy recovery. Victory in the coming year!" the Head of the State said.
